decision_conditions: The replacement tree must be planted by April 2024 on or near the site of the existing tree; the tree should be of an oak (Quercus spp.) species of your choice that is more suited to the site and of a size not less than 10-12cm girth when planted. | Failure to do so will result in a tree replacement notice under section 207 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | It is recommended that planting takes place between the months of October and March but being careful to avoid periods of waterlogging or hard frost. | If the new tree's species is different from that removed, then Ealing's Planning department must be consulted before planting is completed.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: TPO 005 - T1 -  Holm Oak rear boundary of Golden Court - fell
